4M1N.SG.summary: Stark Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the electric wire and cable business in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures, trades in, and provides service test for wire products made from copper and aluminum, which are used in electrical transition, telecommunications, and construction applications. The company's products include bare electric, medium voltage electric, high and extra high voltage electric, and low voltage electric wires; electric wires for general building; telephone line; and fire resistant and flame restardant cables. It also offers manpower services; and services, such as vessel cleaning, off shore construction services, fabrication and maintenance services, etc. related to petroleum business, as well as rents properties. The company was formerly known as Siam Inter Multimedia Public Company Limited and changed its name to Stark Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2019. Stark Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASEFA-R.BK.summary: Asefa Public Company Limited manufactures and provides electrical power distribution, switchboard, and trunking systems in Thailand. The company manufactures and sells modular and licensed type tested switchboards, metal trunking and ladders, luminaire products, and prefabricated mobile units under the ASEFA brand. It also distributes and supplies electrical and control, electrical power distribution, lighting and equipment, energy conservation and renewable energy, cable and accessories, and other products. In addition, the company offers system integration services, such as building automation, chiller management, industrial automation, lighting control and management, energy management, and power quality improvement; and engineering services comprising electrical power distribution, renewable energy, energy conservation, automation and smart control, data center, and others, as well as after sales services. It serves infrastructure, industry, commercial building, residential, healthcare, data center and telecommunication, and power generation sectors. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Samutsakhon, Thailand.

CPT-R.BK.short_name: CPT DRIVES AND POWER PUBLIC COM
CPT-R.BK.long_name: CPT Drives and Power Public Company Limited
CPT-R.BK.summary: CPT Drives and Power Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electrical equipment and control systems used in industrial plants in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Production and Distribution, Construction Contracts, and Services. The company offers drives and automation products, such as DC drives, LV and MV inverters, and starters, as well as PLC, SCADA and HMI, speed feedback device, and motion-controllers; and electrical power components, including MCCB and ELCB, contactors and relays, air circuit breakers, vacuum circuit breakers, vacuum contactors, power fuses, ring main units, smart motor protection relays, MV switchgear, transformers, bus ducts, liquid and oil-cooled starters/NGRs, and power capacitors. It also provides electric motor products, such as AC/DC motors, IEC standard motors, medium voltage motors, and AC vector motor MAC QI series products. CPT Drives and Power Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CTW-R.BK.long_name: Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited
CTW-R.BK.summary: Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric wires and cables, and telephone cables under the CTW brand in Thailand, India, China, and internationally. It operates in four segments: Power Cable, Communication Cable, Enameled and Non-Enameled Wire, and Fiber Optic Cable. The company offers aluminum wires and cables, high-voltage and low voltage power cables, telecommunication cables, fire resistance and flame retardant cables, control and instrument cables, and other products, as well as aluminum/copper conductor cables. Further, it manufactures and distributes fiber optic cables; and enameled and non-enameled wires, including enameled copper and aluminum wires, and non-enameled copper wires. In addition, the company engages in the fabrication of copper rods. It serves government and private sector. Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CTW.BK.long_name: Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited
CTW.BK.summary: Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric wires and cables, and telephone cables under the CTW brand in Thailand, India, China, and internationally. DLSF.F.summary: Delta Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, manufactures, and distributes power supplies and electronic components. The company operates through Power Electronics, Infrastructure, and Automation segments. It offers inductors, RF inductors, transformers, networking products, EMI filters, solenoids, current sensing resistors, and power modules; switching power supplies, standard power modules, and lighting ballasts and LED drivers; DC brushless fans and blowers, motors, thermal management products, cabinet thermal solutions, and ventilation and automotive fans; EV/HEV powertrain solutions and power electronics components; and display and visualization, mobile power, industrial power, and medical power products, as well as healthcare devices. The company also provides automation products and solutions, including drives, motion control systems, industrial control and communication products, power quality improvement products, human machine interfaces, sensors, meters, and robot solutions; and information monitoring and management systems, such as SCADA and industrial EMS for smart manufacturing solutions, as well as building automation solutions comprising building management and control, LED lighting, and intelligent surveillance products. In addition, it offers telecom power systems, networking systems, and UPS and datacenter infrastructure; and EV charging and energy storage systems, renewable energy systems, and high power motor drives. Further, the company rents properties. It operates in the United States, China, India, the Netherlands, Germany, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

GUNKUL-R.BK.summary: Gunkul Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, imports, and exports electrical systems and equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers components for solar, wind turbine, biomass, hydro, combined cycle, and thermal electricity generation plants. It also provides cables and accessories, fuses and switches, hardware and connectors, insulators, lightning protection products, maintenance equipment, tools and instruments, batteries and chargers, capacitors, meters, transformers, live part covers, grounding and preformed products, explosion proof products, lightening and control products, and hardware products for transmission lines, substations, distribution lines, and low voltage lines. In addition, the company generates and sells electricity from renewable energy resources comprising solar and wind energy, as well as produces and assembles LED products. Further, it constructs alternative energy power plants, as well as provides operation and post-construction maintenance services for the solar farms. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAW.F.summary: Delta Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, manufactures, and distributes power supplies and electronic components. The company operates through Power Electronics, Infrastructure, and Automation segments. It offers inductors, RF inductors, transformers, networking products, EMI filters, solenoids, current sensing resistors, and power modules; switching power supplies, standard power modules, and lighting ballasts and LED drivers; DC brushless fans and blowers, motors, thermal management products, cabinet thermal solutions, and ventilation and automotive fans; EV/HEV powertrain solutions and power electronics components; and display and visualization, mobile power, industrial power, and medical power products, as well as healthcare devices. The company also provides automation products and solutions, including drives, motion control systems, industrial control and communication products, power quality improvement products, human machine interfaces, sensors, meters, and robot solutions; and information monitoring and management systems, such as SCADA and industrial EMS for smart manufacturing solutions, as well as building automation solutions comprising building management and control, LED lighting, and intelligent surveillance products. In addition, it offers telecom power systems, networking systems, and UPS and datacenter infrastructure; and EV charging and energy storage systems, renewable energy systems, and high power motor drives. Further, the company rents properties. It operates in the United States, China, India, the Netherlands, Germany, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

QTC-R.BK.summary: QTC Energy Public Company Limited manufactures and sells electric transformers in Thailand and internationally. The company offers hermetically sealed oil type distribution, on load tap changer, amorphous metal distribution, dry type class F and H, pad mounted, earthing, CSP-type, gas sealed, DE bus duct, dry type cast resin, and power transformers, as well as open type transformers with conservators. It also provides various services, such as scheduled checks and maintenance, transformer repairs and maintenance, transformer oil fill services, transformer rental services, etc. In addition, the company invests in renewable energy business; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. It offers its products under the QTC name, as well as under customer specific brands. The company was formerly known as QTC Transformers Co., Ltd. and changed its name to QTC Energy Public Company Limited in August 2010. QTC Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

QTC Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCI-R.BK.summary: SCI Electric Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of electrical switch boards and galvanized steel structures to various public/private sector projects. It operates through three segments: Manufacture of Switch Board, Manufacture and Galvanized Service, and Services and Others. The Manufacturer of Switch Board segment offers low and medium voltage electrical switch boards, cable trays, support systems, and related equipment. The Manufacture and Galvanized Service segment provides transmission line and telecommunication towers, as well as galvanizing steel structures; sells wiring equipment; and offers hot dip galvanized services. The Services and Others segment offers project management services under the engineering, procurementm and construction contract; and distributes and sells electricity produced from the hydroelectric power plant. SCI Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

It also offers manpower services; and services, such as vessel cleaning, off shore construction services, fabrication and maintenance services, etc. related to petroleum business, as well as rents properties. The company was formerly known as Siam Inter Multimedia Public Company Limited and changed its name to Stark Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2019. Stark Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMI-R.BK.summary: Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electrical equipment in Thailand. The company offers a range of ballasts for fluorescent lamps, compact fluorescent lamps, and HID lamps for electronic and magnetic types; and control gear products, such as ignitors, photo switches, change over switches, and transformers for halogen lamps. It also generates and sells electricity. In addition, the company exports its products. Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TMI.BK.summary: Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electrical equipment in Thailand. The company offers a range of ballasts for fluorescent lamps, compact fluorescent lamps, and HID lamps for electronic and magnetic types; and control gear products, such as ignitors, photo switches, change over switches, and transformers for halogen lamps. TRT-R.BK.summary: Tirathai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, repairs, sells, and maintains transformer equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers power transformers for manufacturers and suppliers of electrical energy. It also provides various distribution transformers comprising freely breathing system, completely filled, gas cushion, inert gas pressure system, loop feed or radial feed, and power unit load center transformers. In addition, the company offers special transformers, such as rectifier transformers, which are used in chemical industrial factories; induction furnace transformers that are used in metals smelting industry; and transformers using other insulators, such as silicone oil, etc. Further, it provides transformer tank body and accessories, including covers, fins, clamps, etc.; and distributes, installs, and maintains electrical power equipment. Additionally, the company offers transformer erection and installation, oil filling, maintenance, modification and repair, testing, and equipment rental services; and custom metalwork services. Tirathai Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
